attributes.action: Defer the introduction of the water charge based on house values until the return of the N.Ireland Assembly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The imposition of an extra water charge, based on house values,in addition to the new housing rates system based on house values is a duplication of a charge that we are already paying. This should be left in abeyance until the new N.Ireland Assembly is elected.
